Text: Generate a short paragraph about 'human aging' targeting readability level High School. Limit the output to 100 words. Human aging is a complex process that involves many changes in our bodies and minds over time. As we age, our cells divide more slowly, and we become more susceptible to diseases like cancer, heart disease, and diabetes. Our skin loses elasticity, our bones weaken, and our muscles lose mass. Our brains also change, making it harder to remember things and learn new information. However, aging is not just about decline. Older adults often have more wisdom and experience, and they can make valuable contributions to society.
